question_text:
Question 26  
 
[Database (File Structure)]
Which of the following file organizations is/are I/O efficient for the scan operation in DBMS?
(A) Sorted 
(B) Heap
(C) Unclustered tree index 
(D) Unclustered hash index
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
The file organization that are I/O efficient for the scan operation in DBMS are
(1) Sorted
(2) Heap
Hence, the correct option is (A) and (B)
